(Depends on the dryness of the facil mask) 5.Wash your face with clean wate Features - Material: Natural cotton fleece. - Having facial skin care by yourself, better than to do facial care in beauty salon. Easy and simple to use. - Compressed facial membrane in original sealed package. It starts as a coin compact. After putting into a toner or lotion it becomes a face membrane easily. - Apply on any skin type.']

{'Brand': 'Augoog', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Included Components': 'Face Massager', 'Package Dimensions': '7.5 x 4.75 x 1.95 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Testo-1', 'UPC': '728458420705'}
Just received it and tried it today. 1. The manufacturer didn't tell consumers in the instruction leaflet that the charging cord is a phone cord, needing to be hooked up via an adapter! 2. It works extremely quietly, in fact, were it not for the indicator lights, you'd think it wasn't working! 3. The "charge" feels very prickly..almost like a mild stinging sensation. It takes getting used to. I'll keep it up maybe once/day for a few...see what happens! My review may change...we'll see.
We'll see!

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

The user has a strong preference for cosmetic products, particularly eye makeup, focusing on waterproof formulas for long-lasting wear. Their appreciation for high-quality items is evidenced by positive reviews of effective mascaras, indicating a trend towards practicality and performance. User-friendly packaging and brands that deliver reliability are significant to their buying decisions.

Recently, the user explored a beauty device for skincare and anti-aging, showcasing an ongoing interest in products that enhance both makeup and skincare routines. Their mixed experience with the device reflects a cautious approach to new beauty innovations, as they prioritize long-term effectiveness and reliability.

In a recent interaction, the user purchased DIY facial sheet masks, demonstrating a growing enthusiasm for at-home skincare solutions. Their 5-star review highlights an appreciation for simplicity and effectiveness, suggesting a shift towards products that offer moisturizing benefits for a more rejuvenated appearance. 

Overall, the user’s profile indicates a balanced pursuit of both cosmetic enhancement and skincare solutions, with a focus on products that are easy to use, yield tangible results, and align with their established standards of quality and performance.
